title: eth_call  err="execution reverted"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2.32.0-dev-27de232a
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.15.0-1026-aws x86_64)
Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
eth_call can return results normally

#### Actual behaviour
conn=127.0.0.1:36400 method=eth_call reqid=0 t=129.822µs err="execution reverted"

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

I built a Goerli with Erigon. After 2 days of synchronization, it has printing blocks normally and can get the latest balance. Then I used blockscout to build an explorer, which connects to the rpc node is my Erigon-Goerli, but when the program runs, it keeps reporting this error, and I can’t see more detailed error information, how can I solve it? 

thanks.

#### LOG
